body:
Comment 4: 
I tried these as a normal user (i.e., not su)

: telnet 127.0.0.1
Trying 127.0.0.1...
telnet: Unable to connect to remote host: Connection refused
: telnet 127.0.1.1
Trying 127.0.1.1...
telnet: Unable to connect to remote host: Connection refused

Note that I have a standard debian testing 64-bit system: I'm no sysadmin so don't
fiddle with the system at all.
